verses.name: Genesis 19:35
verses.text: And they made their father drink wine that night also: and the younger arose, and lay with him; and he perceived not when she lay down, nor when she arose.

verses.name: Genesis 19:36
verses.text: Thus were both the daughters of Lot with child by their father.

verses.name: Genesis 19:37
verses.text: And the firstborn bare a son, and called his name Moab: the same is the father of the Moabites unto this day.

verses.name: Genesis 19:38
verses.text: And the younger, she also bare a son, and called his name Ben–ammi: the same is the father of the children of Ammon unto this day.
